prompt:
A seductive Korean woman in her 20s in a quiet cafe hallway, over-the-shoulder composition
(shoulders to mid-thigh).
Outfit: fitted cotton jersey long-sleeve top + high-waist skirt, matte, realistic stretch lines.
Pose: torso twisted, one hand gripping the wall, hips angled forward, subtle arch.
Expression: direct over-shoulder gaze, half-lidded eyes, soft parted lips, no smile.
Lighting: late afternoon side window spill + pale wall bounce, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
